body: God heaven Marvelous, just let us fuck her in the game please
I guess this will make up for her being un-romanceable in the actual game.

10/10, awesome doujin. Also, this is the only way to enjoy RF5 since the best waifus aren't romance options for some stupid reason.
It's like Akane in Da Capo 2 but at least there they had the decency to upgrade her to full heroine in plus communication.
